name: The Other Side (Emmet)
description:
!PLAY IN FULLSCREEN!

Hi!

I am Emmet, and this is my first released game! Basically, you control two characters at once, which are on both sides of the screen. Each side is a little different, however the main goal is to get to the end of the level, by entering the hovering portal with the character on the left.

The game is just a small project, although i may turn it into a full comercial release if many people will be interested.

 I really seek feedback more than donations, ore anything else! Please tell me what do you think about the game and the concept.
